text:
@EricTrump Today’s date is June 21st and it seems like eternity since your dad has made a complete embarrassment of our country

REALITY CHECK:

* 40,000,000 + unemployed (larger number than the entire population of Canada
* 2,000,000 + CASES OF COVID-19
* 100,000 + DEAD
* Economic collapse
